00001 !==============================================================================!
00004 
00005 program main
00006 
00007   use constants
00008   use global
00009   use cmfd_execute,  only: execute_cmfd 
00010   use timing,        only: timer_start, timer_stop
00011 
00012   implicit none
00013 
00014 #include <finclude/petsc.h90>
00015 #include <finclude/slepcsys.h>
00016 #include <finclude/slepceps.h>
00017 
00018   ! initialize
00019   call initialize()
00020 
00021   ! begin total timer
00022   call timer_start(time_total)
00023 
00024   ! execute cmfd
00025   call execute_cmfd()
00026 
00027   ! stop timer
00028   call timer_stop(time_total)
00029 
00030   ! finalize run
00031   call finalize()
00032 
00033 contains
00034 
00035 !==============================================================================
00036 ! INITIALIZE
00037 !==============================================================================
00038 
00039   subroutine initialize()
00040 
00041     integer :: i                    ! loop counter
00042     integer :: argc                 ! number of command line arguments
00043     character(len=25) :: argv       ! a command line argument
00044     character(len=10) :: today_date
00045     character(len=8)  :: today_time
00046 
00047      !========================================
00048      ! INITIALIZE MPI
00049 
00050      ! initialize slepc/petsc
00051     call SlepcInitialize(PETSC_NULL_CHARACTER,ierr)
00052 
00053     ! get mpi info
00054     call MPI_COMM_RANK(PETSC_COMM_WORLD,rank,ierr)
00055     call MPI_COMM_SIZE(PETSC_COMM_WORLD,n_procs,ierr)
00056 
00057     ! find master
00058     if (rank == 0) master = .true.
00059 
00060    
00061     !=========================================
00062     ! WRITE HEADING INFO
00063 
00064     if (master) then
00065 
00066       ! write header
00067       write(*, FMT='(/11(A/))') &
00068     & '    ,o888888o.           ,8.       ,8.          8 8888888888   8 888888888o.      ', &
00069     & '   8888     `88.        ,888.     ,888.         8 8888         8 8888    `^888.   ', &
00070     & ',8 8888       `8.      .`8888.   .`8888.        8 8888         8 8888        `88. ', &
00071     & '88 8888               ,8.`8888. ,8.`8888.       8 8888         8 8888         `88 ', &
00072     & '88 8888              ,8"8.`8888,8^8.`8888.      8 888888888888 8 8888          88 ', &
00073     & '88 8888             ,8" `8.`8888" `8.`8888.     8 8888         8 8888          88 ', &
00074     & '88 8888            ,8"   `8.`88"   `8.`8888.    8 8888         8 8888         ,88 ', &
00075     & '`8 8888       .8" ,8"     `8.`"     `8.`8888.   8 8888         8 8888        ,88" ', &
00076     & '   8888     ,88" ,8"       `8        `8.`8888.  8 8888         8 8888    ,o88P"   ', &
00077     & '    `8888888P"  ,8"         `         `8.`8888. 8 8888         8 888888888P"      ', &
00078     & '__________________________________________________________________________________'
00079 
00080       ! Write version information
00081       write(*, FMT=*) &
00082            '     Developed At:  Massachusetts Institute of Technology'
00083       write(*, FMT='(6X,"Version:",7X,I1,".",I1,".",I1)') &
00084            VERSION_MAJOR, VERSION_MINOR, VERSION_RELEASE
00085 
00086       ! Write the date and time
00087       call get_today(today_date, today_time)
00088       write(*, FMT='(6X,"Date/Time:",5X,A,1X,A)') &
00089            trim(today_date), trim(today_time)
00090 
00091       ! Write information on number of processors
00092       write(*, FMT='(1X,A,I0)') '     MPI Processes: ',n_procs
00093 
00094     end if
00095 
00096     !=======================================
00097     ! PROCESS COMMAND LINE ARGS
00098 
00099     ! get number of command line arguments
00100     argc = COMMAND_ARGUMENT_COUNT()
00101 
00102     ! begin loop around command line args
00103     do i = 1,argc
00104 
00105       ! get that argument
00106       call GET_COMMAND_ARGUMENT(i,argv)
00107 
00108       ! begin case structure
00109       select case(trim(argv))
00110 
00111         ! solver
00112         case('--solver_type')
00113 
00114           ! get next argument
00115           call GET_COMMAND_ARGUMENT(i+1,argv)
00116 
00117           ! set global var
00118           solver_type = trim(argv)
00119 
00120         ! do nothing here
00121         case DEFAULT
00122 
00123       end select
00124 
00125     end do
00126 
00127   end subroutine initialize
00128 
00129 !==============================================================================
00130 ! FINALIZE
00131 !==============================================================================
00132 
00133   subroutine finalize()
00134 
00135     ! finalize slepc/petsc
00136     call SlepcFinalize(ierr)
00137 
00138     ! print output
00139     if (master) then
00140       write(*, FMT='(/,/,A)') 'RESULTS'
00141       write(*, FMT='(A)')     '**********************'
00142       write(*, FMT='(/,"Total Execution time (s): ",F0.4)') time_total%elapsed
00143       write(*, FMT='("K-effective: ",F0.8,/)') cmfd%keff
00144     end if
00145 
00146   end subroutine finalize
00147 
00148 !===============================================================================
00149 ! GET_TODAY determines the date and time at which the program began execution
00150 ! and returns it in a readable format
00151 !===============================================================================
00152 
00153   subroutine get_today(today_date, today_time)
00154 
00155     character(10), intent(out) :: today_date
00156     character(8),  intent(out) :: today_time
00157     
00158     integer       :: val(8)
00159     character(8)  :: date_
00160     character(10) :: time_
00161     character(5)  :: zone
00162     
00163     call date_and_time(date_, time_, zone, val)
00164     ! val(1) = year (YYYY)
00165     ! val(2) = month (MM)
00166     ! val(3) = day (DD)
00167     ! val(4) = timezone
00168     ! val(5) = hours (HH)
00169     ! val(6) = minutes (MM)
00170     ! val(7) = seconds (SS)
00171     ! val(8) = milliseconds
00172 
00173     if (val(2) < 10) then
00174        if (val(3) < 10) then
00175           today_date = date_(6:6) // "/" // date_(8:8) // "/" // date_(1:4)
00176        else
00177           today_date = date_(6:6) // "/" // date_(7:8) // "/" // date_(1:4)
00178        end if
00179     else
00180        if (val(3) < 10) then
00181           today_date = date_(5:6) // "/" // date_(8:8) // "/" // date_(1:4)
00182        else
00183           today_date = date_(5:6) // "/" // date_(7:8) // "/" // date_(1:4)
00184        end if
00185     end if
00186     today_time = time_(1:2) // ":" // time_(3:4) // ":" // time_(5:6)
00187 
00188   end subroutine get_today
00189 
00190 end program main
